name: Boar Hunter 2015: Wild Pig Hunt
description:
Sale of 50% off!

It's boar season! Go on the hunt for wild boar and shoot for the ultimate trophies of bears and more. Are you the ultimate hunter? How accurate are you? Only a crack shot will be able to win a gold medal on each level.

An incredible 3D realistic game that will challenge any pro hunter. Hunt your favorite animal and see if you can shoot them accurate. This is the best hunting games in the AppStore, see if you can handle it.
